product_name: Merrell Mix Master H20 Shoes - Kids' - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Made of synthetic leather and mesh, these lightweight water-ready shoes help kids spring into action with a rip-and-stick strap for a quick, secure fit on any outdoor adventure.
